r.s: Trackback - A generic class for sending and receiving trackbacks.
r.d: A generic class for sending and receiving trackbacks.
r.n: * New data added: 'extra' contains the content of the Array array now, when receiving a trackback. * Option 'continuous' is spelled correctly now. * The wordlist and regex filter do now decode HTML entities. * New spam check, to check against Akismet.com web service. * Fixed reference issues. * More common spam words in the wordlist and regex spam checks.
